ithihasaya pilibanda nyayan, aluthma puwathpath warthawalata saha kathu wakiwalata anukulawa hada gassa ganimata mahadurumandulla yuhusulu wiya. 1989-91 siddhinta perathuwa, shastha්ralika wisheshagnyayingen athi mahath wadi sankhyawa upakalpanaya kale, thaman wisin samajawadaya hatiyata adu ho wadi washayen ananya kara ganunu sowiyat sangamaya sadakalikawa pawathinu athi bawaki.
